publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3542 Fergus Ewing: Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*
